subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2839 is on the way
description_text:
Hi,
I paid for express shipping yet I won't be receiving the pedals within 7
days! My package sat for 3 days at a distribution centre. I should get a
refund on the express shipping cost

Blake Weston

On Thu, 9 Oct 2025, 6:36 pm SIMSONN, <service@simsonn.com> wrote:

conversations.body_text: We sincerely apologise for the delay caused to you. Due to our eight-day holiday period, your shipment has been delayed. We shall provide an appropriate compensation package based on the extent of the delay once your parcel has been delivered.

Full refund of the express shipping cost. The stated delivery time has not
been met so the cost is wasted!

Blake Weston

On Tue, 14 Oct 2025, 2:02 pm service@simsonn.com,

The international site is saying delivery estimated 25/10!! This package
clearly was not sent express. I want my money back

Blake Weston
Hi djph30n1x,    We have refunded your additional delivery charges. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

$20USD is not what I paid for shipping! I paid $29.90 USD and that is what
should be refunded. Clearly you have sent economy because a discount code
was used as that equates to your company not reducing revenue! Refund $9.90
immediately

Blake Weston

On Wed, 15 Oct 2025, 5:07 pm service@simsonn.com,

We apologise for any inconvenience caused. The $9.90 represents the base shipping charge, while the $20 covers additional express logistics fees. In truth, our actual logistics costs far exceed $9.90. Thank you for your understanding.

No! I paid for express shipping and you did not provide it!!! Refund the
total shipping costs. This has delayed my build significantly

Blake Weston

On Fri, 17 Oct 2025, 4:20 pm service@simsonn.com,

And now the the package has sat in Sydney for two business days with no
movement. I am really pissed off with your business and customer service!
Escalate this to a manager

Blake Weston
Put a manager on this case!

Where the hell is my package? I cannot request information from SF Express

Blake Weston

I am furious now!! The package has been handed to a different courier in
Sydney and its being trucked to Perth with an estimated date for delivery
being 2025-10-29 - 2025-10-31*

Simsonn must provide additional compensation for me as this timeframe is
unacceptable. I would have bought elsewhere!!!! Plus since the package has
passed through so many hands Im expecting the package to arrive damaged!

Hi djph30n1x,     We sincerely apologize for the delay. We are currently checking with the logistics provider regarding the status of your package. Should there be any issues, we will promptly arrange for a replacement shipment. Please rest assured.

This has been a joke so far and responses from your company have been
unacceptable!

Blake Weston

On Thu, 23 Oct 2025, 6:27 pm service@simsonn.com,
Hi djph30n1x,  The logistics provider has indicated that parcels shipped to Western Australia are transported via land freight, which may result in a delay of several days.

I had already raised that was a problem. The package should never have been
flown to Sydney, it should have been flown to Perth. I've had enough of
waiting for this

Blake Weston

On Fri, 24 Oct 2025, 12:01 pm service@simsonn.com,

The package was meant to be sent priority express that I paid for. I've
been refunded the cost of the shipping but this massive delay is
unacceptable and I would not have bought from you if this was the case. I
have a new Sim setup that I cannot use until these pedals arrive as the
previous setup was sold to pay for the upgrades!!!

Simsonn need to send another set of pedals with the highest priority
immediately or provide a significant refund for the complete mess of
delivery and wasting my time, or full refund.

Blake Weston
